document_data.caption: A map showing the Black Mountains on Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Black Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Mountains''' were a mountain range located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Black Mountains were found in northwest Gwynneth, forming much of the northern border of [[Myrloch Vale]]. They touched [[Aspenheight]] in the west and were separated from the [[Cambro Mountains]] in the east by the [[Codsrun Creek]]. The [[Deepglen Stream]] flowed south from the Black Mountains' eastern slopes. The Black Mountains were approximately {{SI|60|mi|k|long=yes}} long.
